name: September 11, 2001 (World Trade Center)

timeline.event: NYPD helicopter observes North Tower instability; warning not relayed to FDNY
North Tower collapses; many FDNY in tower lacked situational awareness

coordination_steps_traditional: Port Authority Police on third system
Helicopter reconnaissance not integrated into fire command
quotes: UHF (police) and VHF (fire) frequencies were not interoperable, hampering interagency coordination.
Commanders lacked communication with NYPD who had helicopters at scene.
munin_counterfactual: Unified decision-support layer; pre-agreed playbooks; shared situational awareness (e.g. helicopter feed); faster coordinated decisions and safer withdrawal.
